response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an investment that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value and potential impact on your business, I believe it's worth more than $12,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 14000}
